name: Invoice Template (+Google Sheets Sync)
description:
Sync a Google spreadsheet with this invoice template!

  1. Create invoices in Google sheets üßë‚Äçüíª
  2. Sync with a beautiful template in Figma ‚ú®
  3. Export for clients üíå


But why!

Well, I just got tired of either having to either manually add up/calculate line items when creating invoices in Figma or use a service just to send an invoice that looks nice. Using the Google Sheets Sync plugin now we can just pull data in from a spreadsheet that automatically calculates totals, tax, discounts, or anything you want it to!
